title: Courgette and red onion salad
ingredients: ['800g courgettes, sliced into ribbons or spirals', '½ red onion, very finely chopped or thinly sliced', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', 'pinch of salt', 'freshly ground black pepper', '1-2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice', '½ teaspoon grated lemon rind', '1 tablespoon finely chopped mint', '1 tablespoon finely chopped basil']
